events.comment: use this template to learn from it and make your game happens. have fun! :)
sprites/assets are from kenney.nl | the font used here is Good Neighbors font by Clint Bellanger from opengameart.org (search it) | musics and sounds are from scirra freebundle
all levels use the events from here
Points: the quantity of points the player gets, it is related with the function AddPoints
actions to execute when star layout
show touch controls
hide touch controls
******** player animation and controls: begin
******** player animation and controls: end
when player hit a crystal
when the player is destroyed go to menu
player vs box
if player falls, destroy it
when the player gets to end of layout

sub-events.comment: verify and unlock the next level - bug correction here: before when played all levels, so all levels will be unlocked, but if played, for example, level 1, then the bug was that level 2 will be unlocked and the higher levels will be locked again

events.comment: player vs food

sub-events.comment: give one life if it is possible

events.comment: player vs spikes
player vs enemy
enemy animation when sine is horizontal
enemy animation when sine is vertical
destroy enemy when it stops flashing
set sine on/off of the enemy
pause the game
when the game is paused
when the game is not paused
keyboard and touch: go to menu
Function to when the player get hit
Function to refresh the text on HUD

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Level " & Playing & newline & "Enemies:" & Enemy.Count & newline & "Crystals:" & Crystal.Count & newline & "Points:" & Points

events.comment: Function to add points and the animation of the points
----- ENEMY 2 EVENTS ----- begin
Enemy2 is an enemy that walks right or left on plain terrain and it will change direction if it has a wall on his side or near the end of the floor
Animation and simple AI to right
Animation and simple AI to left
If Enemy2 has wall to left, then it will turn right
If Enemy2 has wall to right, then it will turn left
Look at the collision box for Enemy2 to understand why it will turn left/right when it is not on floor (on the event below)
If Enemy2 is not on floor and walking right/left, then it will turn left/right
Player vs Enemy2 --- this a copy of Player vs Enemy, changing Enemy to Enemy2
----- ENEMY 2 EVENTS ----- end
